title: Wanting Duo Partner - D4+ (Support)
body: Really I am just searching for someone similar to me but, who loves playing support.  Minimum requirements to be Diamond 4 or higher skill level. On during the day and evening to practice together. Working microphone + English speaker. Someone who wants to improve as a player and someone who is unafraid of losing. That last part being quite important. Would also be good if later on we can play other games to relax together. I am ADC main currently Diamond 4 back in the glory days I used to be a master and challenger ranked player and I fill all the listed requirements too. Add me 6I02II24
